Posts.Content: Jun 11, 2007 09:45AM rubysmom wrote: Hi, my mom is in the same situation. She had her lumpectomy and SNB about 3 weeks ago and had another surgery last Monday because one of her margins were too close. We are in the process of trying to get a second opinion. Has anyone gone on to do radiation without great margins? We haven't spoken with her doctors yet. Rad onc and surgeon are on vacation.
